pages.text: $(li)The Wheat Seeds can be plant in Farmland to generate Wheat.$(br)$(li)Wheat Seeds can be used to tame Parrots.$(br)$(li)Wheat Seeds can be used to feed Chickens.
$(li)You can use Wheat Seeds to craft a Seed Pouch in a Crafting Table too.$(br)$(li)Finally you can put Wheat Seeds in a Composter to generate Bone Meal.
